content: Talking of intel, why haven't you kicked me yet? I joined on friday to see who to DM about this leak to find out the material.
And is not permitted now with a end to memory reading in CA.
Do you know that's how you catch ~~dsi's~~ sti's?
Yeah, fucking Collective. Wouldn't advise it.
We're toasters, toasters don't give consent.
Put bread in us, but bagels might not fit?
Width is the issue with proper bagels.
So you're saying calling Col Cucks  is in good taste? Insult us as you will but there are ways to not just be disgusting at the same time.
Unless that's what this faction is about, degrading insults that are not related to the character of the complaint.
I expect it from DSI, not from you guys, I could have thought too much of you guys though, who knows.

Yet defending his statement or obfuscating the blame and not asking him to change it or remove it.

Not that I want any of those outcomes, but you felt the need to give comment and do nothing.
As a key personality of Nomads I'd say so, on your server.
Ie, your not helpless for what is said on your server.

Though I might be being cranky, I intended to just let Dutch know it is out of taste. I apologise for being fervent here. 3 days of hundreds of messages, I can handle people meming, but actual toxic statement that affect the general Col memberbase is cutting the flesh a bit.

It's a ongoing matter, I'm currently working with FB, community members and internally to fix the issues raised. However that doesn't mean I'm going to be placid over comments made Varick. It's not all or nothing.
